scenes.action_text: THE BIG BLUE  by Luc Besson Bob Garland Marylin Golden "God is at the bottom of the sea and I dive to find him." Enzo Maiorca FADE IN:  EXT.  GREEK ISLAND - SUNSET  CREDIT SEQUENCE:  The image is in black and white. The sun disappears behind arid cliffs which cast giant shadows on the sea. A little boy around 8
